definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
to make oneself an object of ridicule
low-paid workers in industries that offer jobs for the unskilled/derogatory-sounding abbr. for 低端產業從業人口|低端产业从业人口

sentences.english: Canada is meanwhile getting older and its population is shifting westwards.
sentences.chinese: 加拿大面临人口老龄化，人口重心也在西移。

sentences.english: Canada is meanwhile getting older and its population is shifting westwards.
sentences.chinese: 加拿大面临人口老龄化，人口重心也在西移。

sentences.english: China's fertility rate may be much lower than official estimates.
sentences.chinese: 中国人口高增长率可能会比政府估计的要低很多。

sentences.english: The population of New Zealand is now three million(s).
sentences.chinese: 新西兰现有人口三百万。

sentences.english: Population can increase in a geometric ratio .
sentences.chinese: 人口可以按几何级数增长。

sentences.english: An estimated fifth of them are in the country illegally.
sentences.chinese: 据估计，这些拉美裔人口中约五分之一都是非法移民。

sentences.english: In history, the overpopulation problem has never been so stand out like now.
sentences.chinese: 历史上，人口过剩的问题从来没有比现在更加突出。

sentences.english: Currently, the Japanese are experiencing an age of having few children in families, which influences the development of higher education greatly.
sentences.chinese: “少子化”是当今影响日本社会的主要人口问题之一。

sentences.english: Conclusions The non-natives are the major component of TB patients in Shenzhen.
sentences.chinese: 结论外来人口是深圳市结核病疫情的主要组成部分。

sentences.english: " He believes that population decline constitute a threat to national development, the initiative "every family raising three or even more children.
sentences.chinese: 他敦促每个家庭养育三四个孩子，以化解人口危机。

sentences.english: China has 1.3 billion people, more than any other country in the world.
sentences.chinese: 中国有十三亿人口，居全球之冠。

sentences.english: The official death toll has also risen, to 110, 000 people.
sentences.chinese: 官方报道的死亡人口数字也已经上升到11万。

sentences.english: The census in the world's second-most populous country is held every 10 years.
sentences.chinese: 印度每十年举行一次人口普查。

sentences.english: Qianshan is a new economic zone with a population of more than three hundred thousand.
sentences.chinese: 千山是一个新的经济区，人口超过三十万。

sentences.english: The closer a society's population growth rate gets to zero, the more population aging it will be.
sentences.chinese: 一个社会的人口增加率越接近零，其人口便愈老龄化。

sentences.english: The closer a society's population growth rate gets to zero, the more population aging it will be.
sentences.chinese: 一个社会的人口增加率越接近零，其人口便愈老龄化。

definition: urbanization level (of a city or town)
